Ministry of Defense of the USSR - Soviet Union national anthem
item.stalinium_sword.tooltip:
Sword made out of §cStalinium§0

§l§cPower to the people!§0

§l§cForward, Comrades!
§f(Shift to expand)
item.stalinium_sword.tooltip_shift:
Sword made out of §cStalinium

§l§cPower to the people!:§f
When hitting an enemy, allies within 5 blocks gain Strength 1 for 5 seconds
§l§cForward, Comrades!:§f
Pressing Right Click applies a speed and haste boost on yourself and all allies infront of you.
item.stalinium_axe.tooltip:
Axe made out of §cStalinium§0

§l§cStalinium Efficiency§0

§l§cLumber for the People
§f(Shift to expand)
item.stalinium_axe.tooltip_shift:
Axe made out of §cStalinium

§l§cStalinium Efficiency:§f
Instantly break trees
§l§cLumber of the people:§f
Each nearby ally gets 1 plank and 1 sapling per log broken with the axe.
item.stalinium_shovel.tooltip:
Shovel made out of §cStalinium§0

§l§cPath of Progress§0

§l§cTo Each According to Their Labor
§f(Shift to expand)
item.stalinium_shovel.tooltip_shift:
Shovel made out of §cStalinium

§l§cPath of Progress:§f
Digs a 3x3 area.
§l§cTo Each According to Their Labor:§f
Mining grants Haste II to you, and Haste I to nearby comrades.
item.stalinium_hoe.tooltip:
Hoe made out of §cStalinium§0

§l§cRain Dividend§0

§l§cShared Bounty
§f(Shift to expand)
item.stalinium_hoe.tooltip_shift:
Hoe made out of §cStalinium

§l§cRain Dividend:§f
Rain doubles your harvest yields.
§l§cShared Bounty:§f
50% chance your comrades get the same crop drops as you.
item.stalinium_pickaxe.tooltip:
Pickaxe made out of §cStalinium§0

§l§cVein of Unity:§0

§l§cOre for All
§f(Shift to expand)
item.stalinium_pickaxe.tooltip_shift:
Pickaxe made out of §cStalinium

§l§cVein of Unity:§f
Instantly mines all connected ore blocks.
§l§cOre for all:§f
50% chance nearby comrades also receive your ore drops.
